items.title: Chart of the Day: Diamonds are forever, at a discount
items.description: Diamond exports from India have plunged to a two-decade low, and the downturn isn’t over yet. As demand slumps and uncertainty looms over U.S. tariffs, FY2026 could see another painful year for the industry.
